price: 42. « Frappe le sol de ton pied, (lui fut-il dit), voici une source d’eau fraîche où tu pourras te laver et boire ! »
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
